scripts.build: pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run build:i18n
scripts.build:assets: pnpm run build:assets:bundle && pnpm run build:assets:static
scripts.build:assets:static: pnpm run build:assets:static:css && pnpm run build:assets:static:scss && pnpm run build:assets:static:js
scripts.build:assets:static:css: if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.css')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && css-minify --dir client/static --output assets/static; fi;
scripts.build:assets:static:scss: if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.scss')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && for file in client/static/*.scss; do sass "$file" "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.scss}.min.css)" --style compressed --no-source-map; done; fi;
scripts.build:assets:static:js: if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.js')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && for file in client/static/*.js; do if [[ "$file" != *.min.js ]]; then uglifyjs "$file" -o "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.js}.min.js)" --compress --mangle; fi; done; fi;
scripts.build:i18n: composer run-script i18n-makepot && composer run-script i18n-makemo && composer run-script i18n-makejson
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch client --ext css,scss,js --ignore '*.min.js' --ignore '*.min.css' --exec "pnpm run build:assets:bundle && pnpm run build:assets:static";
scripts.zip: pnpm run build && composer install --no-dev && composer run-script zip && composer install
